title: Unable to refund Champ without the skin first
body:
hi there

So i recently bought Shen. He was my first champion I bought and I decided to open my free Hextech Chests,
What i received was the usual plus a warlord Shen skin. I soon realized that Shen wasn't for me and decide to refund him.
And here the problem lies . Since i didn't buy the skin i am unable to refund the skin and since I cant refund the skin am unable to refund Shen
Is there anyway around this? or am I stuck with Shen forever 

thanks

replies.body:
Hey! 

Refunds for any content needs to be within the last 90 days, so I don't believe you'd be able to refund Shen, regardless of owning the skin or now. I'm not 100% sure how the skin/champion would work with refunds, especially skins from from Hextech. If you [shoot them a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they'd be able to give you a definite answer and, if they're able to, make any adjustments to your account.
Send in a support ticket and ask them to remove it from your account.
